name: Metalfoes Steelen
desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
Once per turn: You can target 1 other face-up card you control; destroy it, and if you do, Set 1 "Metalfoes" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck.

[ Monster Effect ] 
''Cool iron bodies meet burning metal machines and man/machine combine. Burn up the soul - Metalfoes Fusion!!''
